newsitem.title: UK: 3i Group sets 100 million stg 10-year FRN.
newsitem.headline: 3i Group sets 100 million stg 10-year FRN.

text.p: The following floating-rate issue was announced by lead manager SBC Warburg.
AMT 100 MLN STG BASE 3M-LIBOR MATURITY JUL.07
TYPE FRN MARGIN +10 bp PAY DATE 11.JUL.97
MOODY AA- ISS PRICE 99.49 FULL FEES 0.25
LISTING LONDON DENOMS (K) = SALE LIMITS US/GB
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY BRITAIN TAX PROVS =
